title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Technician Posts
description: The National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Technician- I Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc can apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selecti...
